intro: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP, you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store.
description:
"SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP" -- BUILD THE PET STORE OF YOUR DREAMS. 

In "SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP", you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. Only happy customers are happy to spend more money and keep coming back to your pet shop.Let's go: open your own PET SHOP.

DESIGN YOUR SHOP 
Design your store exactly the way you want it. Choose from a variety of shelves and decorations, place products as you see fit, and set their prices. Build the store of your dreams!

MAXIMIZE YOUR PROFIT 
Monitor stock levels, analyze sales data, and optimize inventory to meet customer needs.

EXPAND AND GROW 
Expand your store and diversify your products to bring even more variety to your store. Hire employees so that they can take over some of your tasks.

MONEY MAKES THE WORLD GO ROUND 
Scan products, charge the correct amount, and make sure that customers leave your store happy and satisfied.
